数字桌搭是一款开源的桌面美化应用，拥有多个美化部件。通过覆盖原始桌面，允许用户创: Deskset is an open-source desktop customization application with multiple widgets. By overlaying the original desktop, it enables users to create personalized desktops and save them as themes for sharing.
除此之外，数字桌搭还拥有强大的插件系统：: Additionally, Deskset includes a powerful plugin system:
支持导入单个 vue 文件作为桌面部件: Supports importing single .vue file as desktop widget
支持导入 py 模块以给部件提供数据接口: Supports importing .py module to provide rest api for widgets
以 HHmm 格式，显示现在时间: Display current time in HHmm format
以 HHmmss 格式，显示现在时间: Display current time in HHmmss format
根据当前时段，显示个性化问候语: Display a personalized greeting based on the time of day
点击右上角按钮保存主题: Click the top-right button to save a theme
点击关闭按钮时，是隐藏窗口还是直接退出: Choose to hide the window or exit directly when clicking the close button
